name: UAC Bypass Abusing Winsat Path Parsing - File
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a path parsing issue in winsat.exe (UACMe 52)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:(*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\system32\\winsat.exe OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\system32\\winmm.dll))`
